name: trossapp
description: TrossApp - Skills-based work order management system monorepo

scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.test:all: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration && npm run test:frontend && npm run test:e2e
scripts.test:all:win: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration && npm run test:frontend:win && npm run test:e2e
scripts.format:check: prettier --check '**/*.{js,json,md}' || echo 'Format check: some files need formatting'
scripts.dev:frontend: bash scripts/flutter-clean.sh && cd frontend && flutter run -d chrome --web-port=8080 --web-hostname=0.0.0.0 --web-launch-url=http://localhost:8080
scripts.dev:frontend:server: bash scripts/flutter-clean.sh && cd frontend && flutter run -d web-server --web-port=8080 --web-hostname=0.0.0.0
scripts.dev:frontend:edge: bash scripts/flutter-clean.sh && cd frontend && flutter run -d edge --web-port=8080 --web-hostname=0.0.0.0 --web-launch-url=http://localhost:8080
scripts.health:backend: curl -f http://localhost:3001/api/health || echo Backend not responding
scripts.build:all: npm run build --workspace=backend && bash scripts/flutter-clean.sh && cd frontend && flutter build web
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run docker:build && npm run docker:up
scripts.ci:build: npm run build:all && npm run docker:build
scripts.db:test:reset: docker-compose -f docker-compose.test.yml down -v && docker-compose -f docker-compose.test.yml up -d
scripts.docs:api:generate: npm run docs:api:export && echo 'API docs exported! Import docs/api/openapi.json into Postman'

author: TrossApp Team
